chat_history.content:
<document>
<title>List of wealthiest Americans by net worth</title>
<content>
This article is about the contemporary list of wealthiest Americans. For a historical list, see List of richest Americans in history.

This is a **list of the wealthiest Americans ranked by net worth**. It is based on an annual assessment of wealth and assets by *Forbes* and by data from the Bloomberg Billionaires Index.


The Forbes 400 Richest Americans list has been published annually since 1982. The combined net worth of the 2020 class of the 400 richest Americans was $3.2 trillion, up from $2.7 trillion in 2017.[1] As of October 2020, there were 614[2] billionaires in the United States.[1]




## Top 25 richest Americans

[edit]

According to *Forbes*, as of April 2023, the 25 wealthiest people in the United States are as follows: [3][4][5]





| Rank | Name | Net worth inbillion US$ | Source of wealth | Date of birth(age)
 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Elon Musk | 180 | Tesla, SpaceX |  (1971-06-28) June 28, 1971 (age 53) |
| 2 | Jeff Bezos | 114 | Amazon |  (1964-01-12) January 12, 1964 (age 60) |
| 3 | Bill Gates | 135.8 | Microsoft |  (1955-10-28) October 28, 1955 (age 68) |
| 4 | Larry Ellison | 119.5 | Oracle |  (1944-08-17) August 17, 1944 (age 80) |
| 5 | Mark Zuckerberg | 117.5 | Meta |  (1984-05-14) May 14, 1984 (age 40) |
| 6 | Larry Page | 117.3 | Alphabet Inc. |  (1973-03-26) March 26, 1973 (age 51) |
| 7 | Warren Buffett | 115.6 | Berkshire Hathaway |  (1930-08-30) August 30, 1930 (age 94) |
| 8 | Sergey Brin | 113.1 | Alphabet Inc. |  (1973-08-21) August 21, 1973 (age 51) |
| 9 | Steve Ballmer | 99.9 | Microsoft |  (1956-03-24) March 24, 1956 (age 68) |
| 10 | Michael Bloomberg | 69 | Bloomberg L.P. |  (1942-02-14) February 14, 1942 (age 82) |
| 11 | Jim Walton | 67.2 | Walmart |  (1948-06-07) June 7, 1948 (age 76) |
| 12 | Alice Walton | 66.3 | Walmart |  (1949-10-07) October 7, 1949 (age 75) |
| 13 | Rob Walton | 66.0 | Walmart |  (1944-10-28) October 28, 1944 (age 79) |
| 14 | Michael Dell | 59.0 | Dell |  (1965-02-23) February 23, 1965 (age 59) |
| 15 | Phil Knight | 57.9 | Nike |  (1938-02-24) February 24, 1938 (age 86) |
| 16 | MacKenzie Scott | 54.7 | Amazon |  (1970-04-07) April 7, 1970 (age 54) |
| 17 | Charles Koch | 54.2 | Koch Industries |  (1935-11-01) November 1, 1935 (age 88) |
| 18 | Julia Koch | 54.2 | Koch Industries |  (1962-04-12) April 12, 1962 (age 62) |
| 19 | Len Blavatnik | 36.8 | Access Industries |  (1957-06-14) June 14, 1957 (age 67) |
| 20 | Stephen A. Schwarzman | 34.5 | Blackstone Group |  (1947-02-14) February 14, 1947 (age 77) |
| 21 | John Franklyn Mars | 33.9 | Mars |  (1935-10-15) October 15, 1935 (age 88) |
| 22 | Jacqueline Mars | 33.9 | Mars |  (1939-10-10) October 10, 1939 (age 85) |
| 23 | Leonard Lauder | 29.8 | Estée Lauder Companies |  (1933-03-19) March 19, 1933 (age 91) |
| 24 | Miriam Adelson | 28.1 | Las Vegas Sands |  (1945-10-10) October 10, 1945 (age 79) |
| 25 | Dan Gilbert | 26.6 | Rocket Mortgage |  (1962-01-17) January 17, 1962 (age 62) |


## See also

[edit]

* The World's Billionaires
* List of countries by the number of billionaires


## References

[edit]

1. ^ ***a*** ***b*** "The Forbes 400". *Forbes*. 2020. Archived from the original on 2019-10-07. Retrieved 2020-10-05.
2. **^** "Forbes Billionaires 2020". *Forbes*. 2020. Archived from the original on 2019-01-04. Retrieved 2020-10-11. The U.S. remains the country with the most billionaires, with 614
3. **^** "Forbes Billionaires 2023: The Richest People In The World". *Forbes*. Retrieved 2023-04-04.
4. **^** "The 400 Richest People In America". *Forbes. 2022*. Retrieved 2022-07-22.
5. **^** "The world's real-time billionaires". *Forbes. 2023*. Retrieved 2023-05-13.

## External links

[edit]

* Bloomberg Billionaires Index
* Forbes 400 - The Richest People in America - 2018 list

functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.
